short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension to copy a web URL along with page title to a computer's clip board.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension to copy a web URL along with page title to a computer's clip board. It's if frequent request from users to copy a page title with page link to take notes. This extension just does that with one click.
